revised_title: Density Matrix Approach to Correlation in a Uniform Electron Gas
tldr: The authors propose a density matrix approach to study correlation in a uniform electron gas. They present two methods, one being a direct generalization of the Hartree-Fock method, to satisfy the Pauli conditions on the first-order and second-order matrices. The methods are applicable to one-dimensional spin variational methods and can be useful for understanding electron gas behavior across various densities.
